item.title: 诺沃格拉茨的银河公司正与美国证券交易委员会商讨股票代币化事宜
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）表示，银河数字控股有限公司（Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd.）正在与美国证券交易委员会商讨利用其数字资产平台将自己的股票和其他股票代币化的事宜。【原文：Billionaire Michael Novogratz said Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd. is talking with the US Securities and Exchange Commission about tokenizing its own stock as well as other equities using its digital-asset platform.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚在紧张的总统选举前维持利率不变
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行维持借贷成本不变，就在总统决选前几天，在经历了数月的政治动荡和市场大跌之后，总统决选可能决定解决预算危机的前景。【原文：Romania’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged just days before a presidential runoff that may determine prospects for tackling a budget crisis after months of political turmoil and a market selloff.】

item.title: 法国制片人以《权力的游戏》为灵感的史诗片征服好莱坞
item.description:
他的教父是弗朗西斯-福特-科波拉（Francis Ford Coppola），他的家族是法国电影皇室，但迪米特里-拉萨姆（Dimitri Rassam）说，他正在开辟自己的道路，计划制作一部全球大片

。【原文：

His godfather is Francis Ford Coppola and his family is French cinema royalty, but Dimitri Rassam says he’s carving his own path with plans to make a global blockbuster

】

item.title: 穆迪警告：南非 Transnet 公司即将耗尽现金
item.description: 据穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，除非获得政府救助，否则南非国有运输和物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd. 将在三个月内耗尽运营和偿债资金。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned transport and logistics company, Transnet SOC Ltd., will run out of money for operations and debt-servicing within three months unless it gets a government bailout, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 阿克曼称哈佛大学董事会全体成员需要辞职
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）要求哈佛大学公司（监管学校的强大机构）董事会全体成员辞职，声称 "他们正在主持摧毁这所曾经伟大的学府"。【原文：Bill Ackman called for the resignation of the entire board of the Harvard Corp., the powerful body that oversees the school, claiming that “they are presiding over the destruction of this once great institution.”】

item.title: 瑞士央行称瑞士与美国在货币问题上交流良好
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士与美国就中央银行的货币干预措施进行了富有成效的会谈，他驳斥了关于瑞士操纵法郎汇率的说法。【原文：Switzerland has had productive talks with the US on the central bank’s currency interventions, Swiss National Bank President Martin Schlegel said, rejecting the suggestion that the country manipulates the franc’s exchange rate.】

item.title: 石油市场的 "失踪桶 "化为乌有
item.description:
国际能源机构对历史需求的修订抹去了三年的库存。【原文：

The International Energy Agency’s revision to historical demand wipes out three years’ worth of stockbuilds.

】

item.title: 阿联酋 EGA 公司将于明年在美国建造特朗普看好的铝厂
item.description: 阿联酋全球铝业公司（Emirates Global Aluminium）计划明年开始在俄克拉荷马州建造一座价值 40 亿美元的工厂，因为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正在推动石油资源丰富的海湾国家进行大规模投资，以规避其关税。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium plans to start building a $4 billion plant in Oklahoma next year as Donald Trump pushes for massive investments from oil-rich Gulf states to avoid his tariffs.】

item.title: 贸易不安持续，华尔街看跌美元
item.description: 本周，美国股市大幅反弹，经济衰退的呼声被抛在一边，但货币交易员却一如既往地看跌美元。【原文：In a week that saw an epic rally in US stocks and recession calls cast aside, currency traders are just as bearish as ever on the American dollar.】

item.title: Charter 同意与 Cox 合并，有线电视交易额达 345 亿美元
item.description: Charter Communications Inc. 已同意与私人控股的 Cox Communications 合并，这项交易将使美国最大的两家有线电视服务提供商联合起来。【原文：Charter Communications Inc. has agreed to combine with privately held Cox Communications in a deal that would unite two of the biggest US cable providers.】

item.title: 我们是否与聊天机器人走得太近？
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Ellen Huet 报道研究人员对我们与虚拟朋友之间情感纠葛的日益担忧。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet reports on researchers’ growing concerns about our emotional entanglements with virtual friends.】

item.title: 贝森特认为新的金融力量将加强经济和美元
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们来看看美国财政部长对私人信贷和稳定币的支持。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 亚马逊在无人机坠毁前拆除了备用着陆传感器
item.description:
保留这项技术可以防止飞机在飞行途中意外关闭螺旋桨并坠落地面。【原文：

Retaining the technology could have prevented the aircraft from accidentally shutting off their propellers midflight and plummeting to the ground.

】

item.title: 为什么说 OpenAI 正在助长它曾警告要反对的军备竞赛？
item.description:

Two new books outline four reasons for OpenAI’s pivot away from its noncommercial origins. 

】

item.title: 美国领先的外星人猎人依靠人工智能加快搜索速度
item.description:
哈佛大学的伽利略项目将高端学术研究带入了一个曾经边缘化的领域，五角大楼正在关注这一进展。【原文：

Harvard’s Galileo Project has brought high-end academic research to a once-fringe pursuit, and the Pentagon is watching.

】

item.title: 市政府与工党在养老金和现金储蓄问题上的争论升温
item.description: 资产管理公司与英国政府就酝酿中的旨在促进国内经济投资的养老金和储蓄改革的争论愈演愈烈。【原文：The tussle between asset managers and the UK government over mooted pension and savings changes aimed at boosting investment in the domestic economy is intensifying.】

item.title: 俄罗斯、乌克兰和土耳其代表团在伊斯坦布尔举行会议
item.description: 据土耳其 TRT 电视频道现场直播，乌克兰、俄罗斯和土耳其代表团在伊斯坦布尔开始会谈。【原文：Talks between delegations of Ukraine, Russia and Turkey started in Istanbul, according to live broadcast on Turkish TV channel TRT.】

item.title: 芯片制造商阴云消散，英伟达股价回升
item.description: 在经历了几个月的荒芜之后，随着对大科技支出的疑虑消退、与中国的贸易紧张局势缓和以及新芯片买家的出现，英伟达公司的股价重新找到了方向。【原文：After several months in the wilderness, Nvidia Corp. shares have found their way again as doubts about Big Tech spending subside, trade tensions with China ease, and new chip buyers emerge.】

item.title: 亚太经合组织贸易部长达成未提及关税的声明
item.description: 包括美国和中国在内的一些世界最大经济体的贸易负责人在达成了一项出人意料的协议之后，同意将重点放在改革全球贸易规则上，而忽略了他们最大的分歧点之一：关税。【原文：Trade chiefs from some of the world’s biggest economies including the US and China agreed to focus on reforming global trade rules, after reaching an unexpected agreement by ignoring one of their biggest points of difference: tariffs.】

item.title: LVMH 集团股价失色，巴黎股市受阻
item.description: 多年来，LVMH 的股票一直是巴黎股票市场的宠儿，如今却成了其最大的拖累。【原文：After being a boon to the Paris equity market for years, LVMH stock is now its biggest drag.】

item.title: 澳大利亚女首富将美股赌注翻倍至 25 亿美元
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之际，亿万富翁矿业巨头吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）在今年前三个月向大盘追踪基金投入了数亿美元，增持了美国股票。【原文：Billionaire mining magnate Gina Rinehart poured hundreds of millions of dollars into broad market-tracking funds during the first three months of the year, boosting holdings of US equities as Donald Trump returned to the White House.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特称新兴市场股票表现将优于其他所有股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，新兴市场股票是 "下一个牛市"，因为它们受益于美元走弱和中国经济复苏。【原文：Emerging-market stocks are “the next bull market” as they benefit from a weaker dollar and an economic recovery in China, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 微软有望在团队调查中躲过欧盟反垄断罚款
item.description: 微软公司有望躲过巨额反垄断罚款，因为欧盟监管机构表示，他们正在就这家美国软件巨头提出的和解方案征求反馈意见，以解决对其 Teams 视频会议应用程序非法捆绑的调查。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is on track to dodge a hefty antitrust fine after European Union watchdogs said they’re seeking feedback on the US software giant’s offer to settle an investigation into illegal bundling of its Teams video-conferencing app.】

item.title: 美国优先 "贸易的复苏锻造了新的股票领袖
item.description: 本周，随着关税紧张局势的缓和，"美国优先"（America First）贸易重新崛起，至少目前是这样。【原文：An unlikely cohort has climbed to the top of the S&P 500 Index’s leaderboard, powered by a resurgence of the America First trade this week as tariff tensions eased, at least for now.】

item.title: 据说激光雷达制造商 Hesai 将秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最大的驾驶辅助系统激光雷达传感器制造商中国和赛集团已秘密申请在香港上市。【原文：China’s Hesai Group, the world’s largest maker of lidar sensors used in driver assistance systems, has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将在数周内确定其他国家的关税税率
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将在 "未来两到三周内 "确定美国贸易伙伴的关税税率，并称他的政府缺乏与所有贸易伙伴谈判达成协议的能力。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would set tariff rates for US trading partners “over the next two to three weeks,” saying his administration lacks the capacity to negotiate deals with all of its trading partners.】

item.title: 中国养猪企业牧原据说将聘请银行在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，生猪饲养者和猪肉生产商牧原食品股份有限公司已聘请中信证券股份有限公司、高盛集团和摩根士丹利为其今年的香港上市工作服务。【原文：Pig breeder and pork producer Muyuan Foods Co. has hired Citic Securities Co., Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley to work on its Hong Kong listing this year, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，俄罗斯通胀可能趋于稳定
item.description: 俄罗斯的物价增长在 4 月份可能停止了加速，这是六个月来的第一次，这为启动期待已久的货币宽松政策提供了支持。【原文：Price growth in Russia likely halted its acceleration in April for the first time in six months, bolstering the case for kicking off long-awaited monetary easing.】
